Always Adapting


Big Bison exists to solve complex problems. We believe some of the most difficult problems in an individual's life occur when they become prominent or successful. Journey management, travel safety consulting, and secure transportation planning are major stressors for the discerning and high profile travelers, no matter their destination.


About BBLGX

More than the individual - we are team focused to achieve success.


While the Founder of Big Bison Logistics has over 20 years of experience in law enforcement, intelligence, special events and personal security industry - Big Bison is about the team. We're nimble and we're small because we hire teammates through referrals, not Indeed.


Every team member is personally vetted by the founder before they are trained by our team to ensure new teammates have values aligned with ours; Integrity, Morals, Flexibility, and Extreme Ownership are building blocks of our culture of service to others.

want to know more?

Read the Luckbox Inteview with Todd, BBLGX Founder/Chief Strategist



A veteran of the $48.1 billion industry tells what it's like protection the rich and famous.

Some of our services

Our team focus extends well into our provided services.


While the Founder of Big Bison Logistics has over 20 years of experience in law enforcement, intelligence, special events and personal security industry - Big Bison is about the team. We're nimble and we're small because we hire teammates through referrals, not Indeed.

  • Counter Surveillance

    More than just a quick saying, but one of the driving forces behind our success.
